content: I notice none of the maps check the reference type right now - and I suppose that's kind of a hard ask. For Procedure where the reference type got limited from Encounter or EpisodeOfCare to just Encounter, should the maps just translate the reference as-is?
OK, let me know - I'll go back and double-check some references I've mapped after that...
@Grahame Grieve have you got an example of this up?
Checking a Reference for the type of resource it's pointing to

Should we use some heuristics to try and figure out (as best as possible) what kind of a resource is referenced? for example when two references get merged into one in r4, and you need to convert it back to r3
I don't know what we can do, actually. And I don't think we have time ... :-(
